Function reference

All functions

ccri_diff()
Calculate difference map
ccri_mean()
Calculate mean of raster objects
ccri_variance()
Calculate variance of CCRI
connectivity()
Calculate and plot maps
cropharvest_rast()
Get raster object for crop
crops_rast()
Get sum of rasters for individual crops
dist_methods()
Distance methods supported
geoscale_param()
Get geographical scales from the parameters
get_param_metrics()
Get metrics from parameters
get_parameters()
Get Parameters
get_rasters()
Get rasters object from parameters
get_supported_sources()
Get supported sources of crops
global_scales()
Global geographical extent
load_parameters()
Load Parameters from YAML File
model_powerlaw() model_neg_exp()
Calculate risk index using inbuilt models.
nn_sum() node_strength() betweeness() ev() degree() closeness() pagerank()
Calculation on network matrix.
reset_params()
Reset parameters.yaml
reso()
Get resolution value
sa_onrasters()
Run senstivity analysis
sean()
Calculate sensitivity analysis on cropland harvested area fraction
search_crop()
Search for crop
sensitivity_analysis()
Calculate sensitivity analysis on parameters
set_global_scales()
Set global geographical extent
set_parameters()
Set Parameters
set_reso()
Set resolution value
sp_rast()
raster for mapspam crop.
supported_metrics()
Returns metrics currently supported in the analysis.
tiff_torast()
Get raster object from tif file
